name: Olivia R
feedback: I matched with a roommate within 3 days! Loved the clean layout and filter system. Verified profiles made me feel safe throughout the process.

name: Karan M
feedback: Some listings were outdated or unresponsive. I tried messaging multiple users, but didn’t get any replies. Auto-removal of inactive listings would really improve the experience.

name: Ayesha S
feedback: Posting my room was super quick! Loved the image upload and preview feature. Interface is smooth, but a premium option to boost listings would be great.

name: Sneha P
feedback: The map view feature really helped me find a place close to my office. I loved being able to compare multiple rooms side-by-side. Super intuitive!

name: Arjun V
feedback: I appreciate the filters, but I’d love more options like pet preferences and smoking habits. Still, it’s one of the better roommate platforms out there.

name: Tanya R
feedback: The verification badge gave me confidence when messaging users. It felt like a much safer experience compared to other platforms I’ve tried.
